name: Back to the Hell
description:
You have an important mission. Help your father get back to hell.

Find him! Rescue him! Lead the way and protect him for all costs. Beware! There may be powers against you on your journey.

Good luck and have fun! 

Learned a lot in the process and had fun doing it. We did as much as we can in such amount of time. We hope you’ll all enjoy. If you experience any toruble please feel free to contact or give any feedbacks. We always want to improve ourselves.

😈😈

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • E - Interact/grab
  • Q - Drop
  • F - Command the car
  • C - Cracks to hell (ammo help)
  • Left Click - Shoot
  • ESC - Pause

For the first puzzle part of the game I’ll gave you a clue. Keep your eye on the compass above the screen.
